TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataAnnotationsModelValidatorProvider extends System.Web.ModelBinding.AssociatedValidatorProvider

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is an implementation of <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelValidatorProvider> that provides validators for attributes that derive from <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationAttribute>. It also provides validators for types that implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.IValidatableObject>.
